      var swapAds = function (index) {
        var elem = window.digitalData.titan.adSlots[index]
        window.digitalData.titan.lazyAdSlots.push(elem)
        var newIndex = tempAdSlots.indexOf(elem);
        if (newIndex > -1) {
            tempAdSlots.splice(newIndex, 1);
        }
      }
      if (
        true &&
        window.digitalData &&
        window.digitalData.titan &&
        window.digitalData.titan.adSlots &&
        window.digitalData.titan.adSlots.length > 0 &&
        window.digitalData.titan.lazyAdSlots

        for (var index = 0; index < window.digitalData.titan.adSlots.length; index++) {
          if (false && /-N-6x2-/.test(window.digitalData.titan.adSlots[index])) {
            swapAds(index)

              window.digitalData.titan.adKeyValues

  var adCallCheckTimeout = 20000
  var callAdLibFlag = false
  var callAdLib = function() {
      if (
        !callAdLibFlag &&
        window.Europa &&
        adCallCheckTimeout >= 0 &&
        window.digitalData.titan &&
        window.digitalData.titan.adSlots &&
        window.digitalData.titan.adSlots.length > 0
       ) {
        window.europa = new window.Europa({
          enableGrapeshot: true,
          enableIAS: false,
          enableLazyLoad: true,
          enableMOAT: true,
          enableSnowplow: false,
        })
        if (
            typeof window.europa.destroy === 'function' &&
            window.googletag &&
            typeof window.googletag.destroySlots === 'function'
           ){
             window.europa.destroy()
           }
        window.europa.init()
        callAdLibFlag = true
      } else if (!callAdLibFlag && adCallCheckTimeout >= 0) {
        adCallCheckTimeout -= 50
        window.setTimeout(callAdLib, 50)
      }
  }

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/markets/equity-markets/asx-to-slip-further-growth-stocks-rebound-20210322-p57crw">
            ASX to slip further; growth stocks rebound
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           The Australian sharemarket is poised to open lower; Airtasker listing delayed by a day due to ASX error; Blackstone bids for Crown Resorts; Freedom Foods returns from suspension. Follow the latest here.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="txAbq aMhfL" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
          <ul class="_1zsf_">
           <li class="_2bSMe" data-pb-type="tg">
            <a class="_2_TMO" href="/topic/monday-fundie-1mp4">
             Monday fundie
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <a class="_1rOIN" href="/markets/equity-markets/the-best-stocks-for-an-inflationary-world-20210315-p57asi" tabindex="-1">

         <h3 class="_1scOx" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="HYV3R" href="/companies/financial-services/i-have-absolutely-no-doubt-he-was-planning-to-do-this-20210320-p57cgp">
           I have absolutely no doubt he was planning to do this
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1Xsh5" data-pb-type="ab">
          A source has revealed Lukas Kamay talked about insider trading on the currency market years before teaming up with his university friend Christopher Hill.
         </p>
        </div>

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/politics/federal/coming-new-developments-in-the-sure-thing-20210318-p57bxo">
            Coming: New developments in The Sure Thing
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           Lukas Kamays scheming about the market may have started well before he embarked on the scheme that is the subject of The Sure Thing. Join us for episode five at 6am on Monday March 22.
          </p>

          </a>
          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/companies/financial-services/you-re-famous-now-the-moment-chris-hill-learnt-of-betrayal-20210314-p57aj1">
            Youre famous now: the moment Chris Hill learnt of betrayal
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           It was only when he heard of a $7 million figure that Hill, who was in a police car after being arrested, realised the scale of the conspiracy hed been plunged into.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>

            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>

            Lessons from the making of The Sure Thing
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
           Video: Angus Grigg and the University of Sydneys professor Clinton Free on white-collar crime and the making of The Sure Thing podcast at the AFR Business Summit.
          </p>
         </div>

           <a class="_1d_DB" href="/companies/financial-services/how-white-collar-criminals-sleep-easy-at-night-20210217-p573ey">
            How white-collar criminals sleep easy at night
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
           A researcher who has spent the past decade in prisons across the US and Australia says there are four main ways white-collar criminals justify their actions.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>

         <h3 class="_1scOx" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="HYV3R" href="/companies/financial-services/castle-rock-global-capital-acted-dishonestly-and-recklessly-20210319-p57ce4">
           Castle Rock Global Capital acted dishonestly and recklessly
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1Xsh5" data-pb-type="ab">
          In blunt language, the administrator has described a scheme where investors were baited to put more money in by false statements showing big returns.
         </p>
        </div>

       <header class="_2Laq2" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-header">
        <h2 class="_1mCQd" data-pb-type="hi" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-heading">
         <a class="Dn1zI" href="/markets">
          Markets
         </a>
        </h2>

       <div class="_2INnt">
        <div class="_2qbi7 ggzpX" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
         <ul class="xLqXJ">
          <li class="Q1SD9" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_7rge0" href="/topic/investing-1st">
            Investing
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <a class="_9HeDc" href="/markets/equity-markets/how-australia-s-top-investors-navigated-the-pandemic-20210319-p57c81" tabindex="-1">

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/markets/equity-markets/does-sezzle-still-have-the-sizzle-20210317-p57bky">
            Does Sezzle still have the sizzle?
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           Sezzle, the miniature Afterpay, has a lot going for it as a bond-market induced sell-off in the BNPL sector eases.
          </p>

           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
           Australian investors are wary ahead of a trading week thats expected to feature another high-profile technology IPO as tensions simmer again between the US and China.
          </p>

           <a class="_1d_DB" href="/markets/debt-markets/perception-gap-widening-between-bonds-and-central-banks-20210321-p57cm4">
            Perception gap widening between bonds and central banks
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
           Time will prove one or both camps to be wrong, the only difference being whether it is reputations or portfolios that are lost, says Ardeas Tamar Hamlyn.
          </p>

       </div>
      </section>
      <section class="_6k6YQ" data-contentunit-id="938">
       <header class="_3Yfc8" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-header">
        <h2 class="EJte5" data-pb-type="hi" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-heading">
         <a class="_3UBwN" href="/opinion">
          Opinion
         </a>
        </h2>
       </header>
       <div class="_1sqb5">
        <div class="_wPAq" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="OpinionStoryTile">
         <ul class="_2yaVb">
          <li class="_2fwoA" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_2d-RF" href="/person/mark-mcgowan-48h">
            Mark McGowan
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_1DRXg" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1naPl" href="/politics/federal/smug-west-australians-who-know-west-is-best-spell-trouble-for-morrison-20210321-p57cpa">
           Smug West Australians spell trouble for PM
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          Mark McGowans landslide election win is proof of a broad community sentiment that  the Eastern States have little to offer or teach a contented WA.
         </p>
         <div class="_3K1Jh _3HaQh" data-pb-type="au">
          <div class="_2IsfG">
           <strong>
            <a class="rx3cF" data-testid="AuthorURL" href="/by/jennifer-hewett-j7gc3">
             Jennifer Hewett
            </a>
           </strong>
           <p class="_3EfkX">
            Columnist
           </p>
          </div>
          <figure class="_1su5T" data-testid="ArticleHeaderAvatar">
           <img alt="Jennifer Hewett" src="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/bd554d239604432a1e2504207ffac0f267b9c3cf" srcset="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/bd554d239604432a1e2504207ffac0f267b9c3cf, https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_160%2C$height_160/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_52%2Cf_auto/bd554d239604432a1e2504207ffac0f267b9c3cf 2x"/>
          </figure>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="_wPAq" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="OpinionStoryTile">
         <ul class="_2yaVb">
          <li class="_2fwoA" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_2d-RF" href="/topic/goods-and-services-tax-hq4">
            GST
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_1DRXg" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1naPl" href="/policy/economy/tax-focus-should-be-reform-to-grow-the-pie-20210321-p57cl0">
           Tax focus should be reform to grow the pie
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          Rather than squabbling over WAs GST deal, the federal and state governments should focus on the bigger picture of structural tax reform.
         </p>
         <div class="_3K1Jh _3HaQh" data-pb-type="au">
          <div class="_2IsfG">
           <strong>
            <a class="rx3cF" data-testid="AuthorURL" href="/by/the-afr-view-h0w04x">
             The AFR View
            </a>
           </strong>
           <p class="_3EfkX">
            Editorial
           </p>
          </div>
          <figure class="_1su5T" data-testid="ArticleHeaderAvatar">
           <img alt="The AFR View" src="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/801e756c7f525c7625f2e1c34c0df67fa5d2d441" srcset="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/801e756c7f525c7625f2e1c34c0df67fa5d2d441, https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_160%2C$height_160/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_52%2Cf_auto/801e756c7f525c7625f2e1c34c0df67fa5d2d441 2x"/>
          </figure>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="YNRqf">
        <div class="_2T2fQ" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="OpinionStoryTile">
         <ul class="_2yaVb">
          <li class="_2fwoA" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_2d-RF" href="/topic/goods-and-services-tax-hq4">
            GST
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_1DRXg" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1naPl" href="/politics/it-s-up-to-frydenberg-to-fix-gst-election-meddling-20210321-p57cl2">
           Its up to Frydenberg to fix GST election meddling
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          The biased redesign of GST to favour Western Australia will disadvantage Victoria and others and make the pandemic repair job even harder.
         </p>
         <div class="_3K1Jh _3HaQh" data-pb-type="au">
          <div class="_2IsfG">
           <strong>
            <a class="rx3cF" data-testid="AuthorURL" href="/by/tim-pallas-p4yvrb">
             Tim Pallas
            </a>
           </strong>
           <p class="_3EfkX">
            Contributor
           </p>
          </div>
          <figure class="_1su5T" data-testid="ArticleHeaderAvatar">
           <img alt="Tim Pallas" src="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/e5356981983ea01a38fb9e4065165dbddc95565d" srcset="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/e5356981983ea01a38fb9e4065165dbddc95565d, https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_160%2C$height_160/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_52%2Cf_auto/e5356981983ea01a38fb9e4065165dbddc95565d 2x"/>
          </figure>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="_2T2fQ" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="OpinionStoryTile">
         <ul class="_2yaVb">
          <li class="_2fwoA" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_2d-RF" href="/topic/monetary-policy-5zu">
            Monetary policy
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_1DRXg" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1naPl" href="/policy/economy/forward-guidance-risks-future-credibility-20210321-p57cl1">
           Forward guidance risks future credibility
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          The RBAs assurance that interest rates will stay nailed to the floor until 2024 creates political and financial risks that might make the central bank reluctant to normalise monetary policy.
         </p>
         <div class="_3K1Jh _3HaQh" data-pb-type="au">
          <div class="_2IsfG">
           <strong>
            <a class="rx3cF" data-testid="AuthorURL" href="/by/warren-hogan-p4yvkf">
             Warren Hogan
            </a>
           </strong>
           <p class="_3EfkX">
            Columnist
           </p>
          </div>
          <figure class="_1su5T" data-testid="ArticleHeaderAvatar">
           <img alt="Warren Hogan" src="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/d5e8c31abb42401f8c3b4ed978e614dd21d17d9b" srcset="https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_80%2C$height_80/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_85%2Cf_auto/d5e8c31abb42401f8c3b4ed978e614dd21d17d9b, https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_160%2C$height_160/t_crop_fill/e_sharpen:25%2Cq_52%2Cf_auto/d5e8c31abb42401f8c3b4ed978e614dd21d17d9b 2x"/>
          </figure>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="_2T2fQ" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="OpinionStoryTile">
         <ul class="_2yaVb">

         <h3 class="_1DRXg" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1naPl" href="/politics/federal/morrison-bamboozled-by-his-own-spin-20210318-p57btu">
           Morrison bamboozled by his own spin
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          It has been a bad week for the governments messaging, but it has been a shocker for government accountability.
         </p>
         <div class="_3K1Jh _3HaQh" data-pb-type="au">
          <div class="_2IsfG">

           Playing the bully has not worked out for China
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1xD4u" data-pb-type="ab">
          Beijings rule-breaking has only unified others against it, when it hoped to divide them.

         <h3 class="_1scOx" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="HYV3R" href="/policy/economy/risks-rising-for-apra-property-lending-intervention-20210321-p57cls">
           Risks rising for APRA property lending intervention
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1Xsh5" data-pb-type="ab">
          As house prices start to rebound some are preparing early for what regulators will introduce to restrict lending.
         </p>
        </div>

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/companies/energy/a-labor-liberal-political-alliance-propped-up-portland-to-save-coal-20210319-p57c9b">
            A Labor-Liberal political alliance propped up Portland to save coal
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           If Portlands aluminium smelter had been allowed to close, officials believed a coal-power plant would have shut too.
          </p>

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_20-Rx" href="/politics/don-t-suspend-astrazeneca-vaccine-rollout-afr-readers-20210321-p57cm0">
            Dont suspend AstraZeneca vaccine rollout: AFR readers
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           Three-quarters ofreaders of The Australian Financial Review do not think Australia should follow the lead of countries in Europe and suspend the AstraZeneca vaccine, with most saying they would take the jab.
          </p>

           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
           Federal and state governments invested more than $7 billion in clean energy stimulus measures in 2020
          </p>
         </div>

           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">

        <h2 class="_1mCQd" data-pb-type="hi" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-heading">

          Property
         </a>

       <div class="_2INnt">
        <div class="_2qbi7 ggzpX" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
         <ul class="xLqXJ">
          <li class="Q1SD9" data-pb-type="tg">

            Property market
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <a class="_9HeDc" href="/property/residential/toorak-mansion-fetches-20m-as-market-picks-up-20210321-p57ckp" tabindex="-1">

          <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">

            Crunch time for renters as moratoriums end in key markets
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
           Rents could rise by up to 20 per cent after pandemic-driven halts to increases end this week in NSW, Victoria and WA, just as JobKeeper finishes.
          </p>

           </a>
          </h3>

        </div>

         </a>
         <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_20-Rx" href="/wealth/investing/spactacular-opportunity-may-bypass-us-20210321-p57cnq">
           SPACtacular opportunity may bypass us
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
          SPACs have been phenomenally successful in the US, with about $US78 billion being raised through SPAC IPOs alone in 2020 and $US72 billion so far this year.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="zCSa-" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
         <ul class="hPvVF">
          <li class="_1zRcC" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_3CH0S" href="/topic/ethical-investing-hp2">
            Ethical investing
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_3dCHV" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1d_DB" href="/wealth/investing/climate-change-investing-jolly-green-giant-or-next-bubble-20210316-p57ba3">
           Climate change investing: jolly green giant or next bubble?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
          Renewable energy assets are hurtling towards $US4 trillion following the pandemic and renewed global commitments to net-zero emissions. Avoiding harmful sectors and companies is no longer enough; investors want to back climate winners.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="zCSa-" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
         <ul class="hPvVF">
          <li class="_1M34m" data-pb-type="lb">
           Analysis
          </li>
          <li class="_1zRcC" data-pb-type="tg">
           <a class="_3CH0S" href="/topic/wealth-generation-1nid">
            Wealth Generation
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <h3 class="_3dCHV" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1d_DB" href="/wealth/investing/koalas-to-the-moon-millennial-traders-try-to-change-the-world-20210318-p57bvp">
           Koalas to the moon: Millennial traders try to change the world
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
          Social media influencers have re-deployed their army of activist investors from attacking hedge funds to bankrolling worthy charitable causes.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>

         <h3 class="ESize" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_20-Rx" href="/work-and-careers/workplace/cfmeu-lays-waste-to-non-union-deals-20210321-p57clh">
           CFMEU lays waste to non-union deals
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_48ktx" data-pb-type="ab">
          The construction union has declared that builders attempts to establish a beach head of non-union agreements in NSW has failed, using strict approval tests to knock out almost all of them.
         </p>

         <h3 class="_3dCHV" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
          <a class="_1d_DB" href="/companies/professional-services/law-firms-hampered-by-poor-staff-wellbeing-low-productivity-20210317-p57bmu">
           Law firms hampered by poor staff wellbeing, low productivity
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p class="_1bUFN" data-pb-type="ab">
          Law firms looking to bounce back from the pandemic are facing issues with staff wellbeing, low productivity and declining demand from new clients, a survey of more than 80 firms reveals.
         </p>

      <section class="_1ZHqg" data-contentunit-id="753">
       <header class="_2mgKY" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-header">
        <h2 class="_1-YL5" data-pb-type="hi" data-testid="ContentUnitHeading-heading">
         <a class="sfBrN" href="/life-and-luxury">
          Life &amp; Luxury
         </a>
        </h2>
       </header>
       <div class="_2dCbA">
        <div class="_2symW" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBaseImageLed">
         <a class="_1528E" href="/life-and-luxury/arts-and-culture/gretel-gladys-dig-deep-for-sydney-theatre-company-s-18m-hole-20210319-p57cem" tabindex="-1">

          <h3 class="_1V6-s" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">

           </a>
          </h3>

          <h3 class="_1V6-s" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_39huy" href="/life-and-luxury/arts-and-culture/haunted-by-afghanistan-sally-sara-turned-her-trauma-into-a-play-20210312-p57a7f">
            Haunted by Afghanistan, Sally Sara turned her trauma into a play
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_2i5DU" data-pb-type="ab">
           After suffering a breakdown when she returned to Australia, the award-winning journalist dug deep to write a script based on her experience as a foreign correspondent.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="oBCsQ" data-pb-type="st" data-testid="StoryTileBase">
          <ul class="_31vgn">
           <li class="_3WLFh" data-pb-type="tg">
            <a class="_3Yjua" href="/topic/coronavirus-pandemic-1ndb">

            </a>
           </li>

          <a class="_3SpPj" href="/politics/federal/new-zealand-two-way-travel-bubble-expected-within-weeks-20210319-p57c8m" tabindex="-1">
           <figure class="_66BnI LDcQH _2zofX _62JAq _1-amF" data-pb-type="im">

          <h3 class="_1V6-s" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">

            Two-way trans-Tasman travel bubble expected within weeks
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_2i5DU" data-pb-type="ab">
           Air New Zealand announced twice weekly services to Hobart, set to take off as soon as a two-way travel bubble is in place.
          </p>

          <h3 class="_1V6-s" data-pb-type="hl" data-testid="StoryTileHeadline-h3">
           <a class="_39huy" href="/life-and-luxury/arts-and-culture/at-hamilton-the-world-s-most-sought-after-seats-for-10-20210319-p57ccj">
            At Hamilton, the worlds most sought-after seats for $10
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="_2i5DU" data-pb-type="ab">
           With stages shut around the world, the Sydney production has become the hottest seat in musical theatre. And every night 40 go for just $10 each.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
